title: If you've been banned. Maybe you could use some tips on leveling up a new account quickly.
body:
So, here's a guide that I wrote that should help you a lot. http://www.lolking.net/guides/392167
Any feedback is appreciated.

replies.body: I'm not sure I would advise the AFK jungle farming mention in your guide.  Even though you don't trigger an auto DC, the LB system can pick up behaviors that are meant to avoid getting DC'd but don't, ultimately, contribute to winning.

that method should only be used in coop vs ai games. More likely than not, no one will be bothered by it.

> [{quoted}](name=MaIevoIent,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cuEmg0Kw,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-04-25T05:39:10.616+0000)

Doesn't matter.  They removed Leave/AFK as a report option because it's done automatically.  It monitors all matchmade formats, including bot games.  The only way to dodge LB penalties is to play custom games... and you can't gain XP from Customs unless you have enough live players and even teams.
